DC CODE ยง 11-701

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The District of Columbia Court of Appeals (hereafter in this subchapter referred to as the "court") shall continue as a court of record in the District of Columbia.
The court shall have a seal.

title.text: Organization and Jurisdiction of the Courts. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: District of Columbia Court of Appeals.

heading.catch_text: Continuation of court; court of record; seal.
